_comment: LocalScribe AI Prompt Parameters - User-configurable settings for AI behavior
_instructions: Edit these values to customize how the AI model generates summaries

summary._word_count_tolerance_help: Allow generated summaries to be within ±N words of target (e.g., 200 word target → 180-220 word range)
summary._slider_increment_help: Slider moves in increments of N words (e.g., 50 → slider shows 100, 150, 200, 250...)
summary._default_words_help: Default summary length when application starts
summary._temperature_help: Sampling temperature (0.0-1.0). Lower = more factual/deterministic, Higher = more creative. Recommended: 0.2-0.4 for legal summaries

generation._top_p_help: Nucleus sampling parameter (0.0-1.0). Controls diversity. Recommended: 0.85-0.95
generation._tokens_per_word_estimate_help: Rough estimate of tokens per word for max_tokens calculation. Typically 1.3-1.5 for English
generation._token_buffer_multiplier_help: Extra token budget multiplier to prevent mid-sentence cutoffs (1.0 = no buffer, 1.3 = 30% extra tokens). Recommended: 1.2-1.5
